title: travelplanner: We're planning a week-long trip with 2 people, starting in Key West and visiting 3 cities in Texas from March 3rd to March 9th, 2022. Our budget is set at $7,200 and we require accommodations that allow parties and where we have the entire rooms. As for dining, we would like to experience Mexican, Italian, Chinese, and American cuisines. (d5ea6b936bbeb8fd)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

chat_history.name: flight_search

chat_history.content:
## Texas City Recommendations

Here are some cities you can consider visiting in Texas:
- Austin
- Houston
- San Antonio
- Dallas
- El Paso
- Amarillo

You can explore these cities during your trip and experience the diverse culture and attractions they offer. 

## Key West Attractions
- Southernmost Point of the Continental U.S.A. - Mark the southernmost point of the continental United States and get a unique photo opportunity.
- Key West Aquarium - Discover the diverse marine life of the Florida Keys.
- Fort Zachary Taylor Historic State Park - Explore the historic fort and enjoy the scenic views.
- Key West Lighthouse - Climb the lighthouse for breathtaking views of the city.
- Smathers Beach - Relax and enjoy the beautiful beach, perfect for swimming and sunbathing.
- Sunset Celebration at Mallory Square - Witness the famous sunset celebration with street performers and artists.
- Mel Fisher Maritime Museum - Learn about maritime history and explore the collection of artifacts.
- Fort East Martello Museum - Discover the historical significance of this museum and admire the art exhibits.
- Truman Little White House - Take a tour of the historic house and learn about its historical importance.
- Mallory Square - Stroll along this iconic square and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere.
- The Kapok Tree - Visit this historic tree with a unique story and beautiful surroundings.

## Key West Accommodation Options
- Classic Brooklyn Brownstone - A spacious and luxurious entire home/apt option with modern amenities.
- Modern luxurious studio apt. - A cozy and convenient entire home/apt near Times Square.
- Space & Comfort in Victorian Brooklyn home - Spacious and elegant entire home/apt perfect for larger groups.

Please note that these accommodations may not allow parties due to house rules, so it's important to check the specific rules before booking.

## Key West Dining Options
- Pindi's Kitchen - Enjoy delicious Mexican, fast food, and American cuisine.
- Happy Hakka - Indulge in mouthwatering pizza, Mexican, bakery, BBQ, and American dishes.
- Sanghai Food - Satisfy your cravings for Mexican, BBQ, and seafood.
- Bombay Brasserie - Try authentic Chinese, desserts, and seafood.
- Milse - Savor pizza, Italian, Mexican, bakery, and seafood.
- Divino Fogão - Taste the flavors of tea, bakery, BBQ, and seafood.
- Charming Chicken - Experience Italian and fast food delights.

Unfortunately, there are no flights available from Key West on March 3, 2022. You may want to check for alternative travel options or adjust your travel dates to find suitable flights. 

Remember to book your accommodations and make restaurant reservations in advance to ensure availability during your trip.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
